channel.title: [PI] Kill/Death Count For Quest Tab
channel.description: Ok so i'm trying to get my quest tab to show kills and deaths but i can't find the proper code to put in i've tried many combinations like +c.killedPlayers+ but I have no idea what to do for death and by the way the combination I tried for kills did not work although it didn't give any errors.

item.title: [PI] Kill/Death Count For Quest Tab
item.dc:creator: @DaMatt17 DaMatt17
item.description:
@DaMatt17 wrote:

Try this:

if (playerKills/playerDeaths < 2){ getPA().sendFrame126("KDR: 1", 7332); } else if (playerKills/playerDeaths >= 2){ getPA().sendFrame126("KDR: 2", 7332); } else if (playerKills/playerDeaths >= 3){ getPA().sendFrame126("KDR: 3", 7332); } else if (playerKills/playerDeaths >= 4){ getPA().sendFrame126("KDR: 4", 7332); } else if (playerKills/playerDeaths >= 5){ getPA().sendFrame126("KDR: 5", 7332); } else if (playerKills/playerDeaths >= 6){ getPA().sendFrame126("KDR: 6", 7332); } else if (playerKills/playerDeaths >= 7){ getPA().sendFrame126("KDR: 7", 7332); } else if (playerKills/playerDeaths >= 8){ getPA().sendFrame126("KDR: 8", 7332); } else if (playerKills/playerDeaths >= 9){ getPA().sendFrame126("KDR: 9", 7332); } else if (playerKills/playerDeaths >= 10){ getPA().sendFrame126("KDR: 10", 7332); }

And replace the playerKills/playerDeaths to your ones.

Read full topic
